articles.title: Trial begins for 20 defendants charged in 2015 Paris attacks that killed 130 - CBC.ca
articles.description: With a heavy security presence, the trial of 20 men accused in a series of co-ordinated attacks on Paris in 2015 that spread fear across Europe and transformed France opened Wednesday in a custom-built complex embedded within a 13th-century courthouse.

articles.title: Astronaut on board the ISS snaps a breathtaking photo of the edge of the Earth - Daily Mail

articles.content:

articles.title: NASA rover Perseverance collects first Martian rock sample - The Jerusalem Post
